title: Rush Royale Promo Codes – April 2025
description: Find all the latest Rush Royale Promo codes here!
author: Jean-Roux Denysschen
excerpt: Check out all the latest Rush Royale Promo Codes – April 2025 right here! Redeem them for amazing rewards!
text: Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more. In our Rush Royale promo codes guide, players can find the latest information regarding codes for the game and how the rewards can be claimed. Photo: MY.GAMES B.V. If you are looking to get free rewards for this action-packed game then you are at the right place. The game allows players to enter active game codes to receive rewards like gold and emotes to use in gameplay. Rush Royale is not the only popular game that uses codes to give back to the players in the form of rewards. Our website features other classic games where players can also enter codes like Brawlhalla, Legends Rewritten, and Titan Warfare. The following Rush Royale promo codes are currently redeemable: XZ1N-ARRF-X5DP 100 Gems Y14NTB4WTMY6 200 Gems Y1Z5-RDRE-1G36 50 Crystals Y127-6RUU-XC4E 60 EXP Coins Y1WF-B2R2-UCR8 60 EXP Coins Y2O7-U3TA-BGT5 200 potions Y4R7-ADX0-JIJ7 Y4TY-JY4D-1CMR Y4OF-FOIL-6A6R 50 Tech Cores Y4TZ-0WK8-POHR 2.5k Gold Y5G7-04TG-W74K 100 gems Y6ZR-JNL9-YL8E Gold YAKC-WV38-IMFN Rubber Ducky Emote YAKD-UF5U-N3AK Plague Doctor Emote Photo: MY.GAMES B.V. Some new players of the game might not know how they can enter these active codes into the game to claim all of the free rewards. Below is the step-by-step process to claim codes: Open Rush Royale on your mobile device. Click on the menu icon that can be found in the top right corner of the game. Click on “Promo Codes”. Use the active codes featured in this article and paste them into the text box. Click on “Apply” and enjoy the rewards! What Codes Do In Rush Royale? Photo: MY.GAMES B.V. The codes in the game will give players in-game currency like Crystals and Gold which they can use in the shop section. Code Not Working If a code does not work it may have expired or has been entered incorrectly into the text box. We recommend that players copy and paste the codes in this article to avoid any problems. Let us know in the comment section below if any of the active codes featured in this article did not work for you. How To Find New Codes Photo: MY.GAMES B.V. Players can search for the game name on our website to find more information about the game codes. Additionally, players can check out the Discord Server for the game to receive updates on new active codes. Conclusion: We would recommend that players use all of the in-game currency Rush Royale promo codes to be able to buy more items in the game. Let us know in the comment section below if you have found any additional codes to use in the game. html:
Editorial Note: Talk Android may contain affiliate links on some articles. If you make a purchase through these links, we will earn a commission at no extra cost to you. Learn more.

In our Rush Royale promo codes guide, players can find the latest information regarding codes for the game and how the rewards can be claimed.

If you are looking to get free rewards for this action-packed game then you are at the right place.

The game allows players to enter active game codes to receive rewards like gold and emotes to use in gameplay.

Rush Royale is not the only popular game that uses codes to give back to the players in the form of rewards.

Our website features other classic games where players can also enter codes like Brawlhalla, Legends Rewritten, and Titan Warfare.

The following Rush Royale promo codes are currently redeemable:

  • XZ1N-ARRF-X5DP
    • 100 Gems
  • Y14NTB4WTMY6
    • 200 Gems
  • Y1Z5-RDRE-1G36
    • 50 Crystals
  • Y127-6RUU-XC4E
    • 60 EXP Coins
  • Y1WF-B2R2-UCR8
    • 60 EXP Coins
  • Y2O7-U3TA-BGT5
    • 200 potions
  • Y4R7-ADX0-JIJ7
  • Y4TY-JY4D-1CMR
  • Y4OF-FOIL-6A6R
    • 50 Tech Cores
  • Y4TZ-0WK8-POHR
    • 2.5k Gold
  • Y5G7-04TG-W74K
    • 100 gems
  • Y6ZR-JNL9-YL8E
    • Gold
  • YAKC-WV38-IMFN
    • Rubber Ducky Emote
  • YAKD-UF5U-N3AK
    • Plague Doctor Emote

Some new players of the game might not know how they can enter these active codes into the game to claim all of the free rewards.

Below is the step-by-step process to claim codes:

  1. Open Rush Royale on your mobile device.
  2. Click on the menu icon that can be found in the top right corner of the game.
  3. Click on “Promo Codes”.
  4. Use the active codes featured in this article and paste them into the text box.
  5. Click on “Apply” and enjoy the rewards!

What Codes Do In Rush Royale?

The codes in the game will give players in-game currency like Crystals and Gold which they can use in the shop section.

Code Not Working

If a code does not work it may have expired or has been entered incorrectly into the text box.

We recommend that players copy and paste the codes in this article to avoid any problems.

Let us know in the comment section below if any of the active codes featured in this article did not work for you.

How To Find New Codes

Players can search for the game name on our website to find more information about the game codes.

Additionally, players can check out the Discord Server for the game to receive updates on new active codes.

Conclusion:

We would recommend that players use all of the in-game currency Rush Royale promo codes to be able to buy more items in the game.

Let us know in the comment section below if you have found any additional codes to use in the game.

Jean-Roux has been a professional writer for 1 year now, however his passion for mobile gaming extends for over 10 years. He loves shooter and sport games, and his current favorite mobile game is PubG Mobile. He holds a Bcom Digital Marketing Degree, and as well as writing for Playoholic, he works with Sitetrail and GC Media Holdings.
